mapper.select: select * from board order by board_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (board_idx, board_name, board_title, board_content, board_date) values (board_seq.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update board set board_name = #{param2}, board_title = #{param3}, board_content = #{param4} where board_idx = #{param1}
update board set board_hit = board_hit + 1 where board_idx = #{param1}
